oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conventionalisation? Organic farming bites back!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Darnhofer, Ika
Bellon, Stéphane
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
Values, standards and certification
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a summary of the discussion during the workshop 2.6 on conventionalisation of organic farming and how farmers or farmers' associations avoid conventionalisation. It also includes the abstracts of the papers that were presented during the workshop.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Darnhofer, Ika and Bellon, Stéphane (2009) Conventionalisation? Organic farming bites back! Workshop at: XXIII ESRS Congress, Vaasa (Finland), 17-21 Aug. 2009. [Completed]
